actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Little Pee Dee River in the State of South Carolina for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified portion of the Little Pee Dee River in the State of South Carolina as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic River System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Little Pee Dee River in the State of South Carolina for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.
